message:
SYSTEM: GeneralOntologies.pdf: Página 99
Based on Mariano Fernández-López, Asunción Gómez-Pérez and Mª Carmen Suárez Figuereoa’s work 
MULTI-FCA WITH GALICIA. HOW TO CREATE A SET OF TABLES 
In the main window: File > New Context or Family of Contexts 
In the new Window, for each table to be created: Edit > Add New Multi-Valued Context  
To download the tool: http://www.iro.umontreal.ca/~galicia/
speaker: SYSTEM
